original Spanish: Fandor informado por Martialle había venido para ponerse a disposición.
original English: Fandor informed by Martialle had come to finish the matter.

original Spanish: Comprometida en el asesinato de su marido Lord Beltham por Gurn su amante que no era otro que Fantômas Lady Beltham descansa a falta de pruebas en el prado de un convento cerca de Paris.
original English: Compromised by her accomplice and lover Gurn in assassination of her husband lord Beltham lady Beltham was discharged for lack of proof.

original Spanish: Es una cisterna para recoger el agua de lluvia.
original English: - It's a tank to gather the rainwater.

original Spanish: Sí nos marcharemos pero antes el inspector Juve será encontrado muerto en su cama muerto por mi silencioso ejecutor...
original English: - Yes we will leave. But before the inspector Juve will be found dead in his bed killed by my silent executioner...

original Spanish: El inspector Juve no había olvidado el cadáver aplasdo encontrado en el departamento de Chaleck. Y por la noche del tercer día...
original English: The inspector Juve has not forgotten the crushed body found at Chaleck's.

original Spanish: Ignorando que había sido sorprendido por Juve y Fandor Fantômas considera el chalet de Lady Beltham como un escondrijo seguro.
original English: Unaware that he had been discovered there by Juve and Fandor Fantômas held the villa of lady Beltham for a sure hiding-place.

original Spanish: Asustado por la tormenta de nieve Cacho volvió a su hogar.
original English: Frightened by the snowstorm Chub turned for home

original Spanish: Mientras tanto por el pueblo circuló el rumor de que Vakula se había ahogado.
original English: Meanwhile a rumour went around the village that Vakula had drowned

original Spanish: Me casaré sin ellos... por N. Nusinova y Iurii Tsiv'ian. ¡No necesito zapatos taco aguja!
original English: I'll marry you without them... by N.Nusinova and Iurii Tsiv'ian.

original Spanish: Scapinelli era conocido entre los estudiantes por su forma de ser sin escrupulos.
original English: Scapinelli was known among the students to be without scruples.

original Spanish: Pues creo que para el mejor espadachín de Praga y el mas atrevido debe haber alguna posibilidad
original English: I believe there must be some opportunities for the best and most daring swordsman of Prague

original Spanish: La celosa Lyduschka sabe todo de los embrollos del viejo Scapinelli y teme por Balduin.
original English: The jealous Lyduschka knows all about the old Scapinelli and fears for Balduin.

original Spanish: Preparativos para la caza en el Castillo del Conde Schwartzenberg.
original English: Arrangements are made for the hunt in Count Schwartzenberg's castle.

original Spanish: Os estoy eternamente agradecido por haber salvado a mi hija
original English: I am grateful for life for saving my daughter's life

original Spanish: ¡Escoged por tanto lo que deseeis!
original English: So do choose whatever you like!

original Spanish: Ha comenzado una nueva vida para Balduin...
original English: A new life started for Balduin...

original Spanish: Querida Condesa por favor mantened la promesa que me habeis hecho de encontrarnos mañana por la tarde en el lugar acostumbrado.
original English: Dear Countess please I beg you to keep your promess to meet tomorrow afternoon in the usual place.

original Spanish: Querida Condesa por favor mantened la promesa que me habeis hecho de encontrarnos mañana por la tarde en el lugar acostumbrado.
original English: Dear Countess please I beg you to keep your promess to meet tomorrow afternoon in the usual place.

original Spanish: La Condesa Margit sale para ir a la cita.
original English: Countess Margit is leaving for her date.

original Spanish: Mi querida Condesa por la tranquilidad... la paz... la soledad...
original English: My dear Countess for the quietness... the peace... the solitude...

original Spanish: Balduin todavia trastornado por lo acontecido regresa a casa...
original English: Balduin still worried by what happened returns home...

original Spanish: ¿Que os trae por aquí Señor Baron?
original English: What brings you here Baron?

original Spanish: ¿Usted por aquí Señor Conde?
original English: What are you doing here Count?

original Spanish: Es el único hijo de mi hermana y el futuro marido de mi hija mi heredero y el último que para transmitir el apellido de nuestra familia
original English: He is the only son of my sister and the future husband of my daughter he is my heir and the last one to carry our name

original Spanish: ¡Me librare de tí  de una vez por todas...
original English: I will get rid of you once and for all...

original Spanish: Por favor acepte mis humildes disculpas por molestarle en este momento...
original English: Please accept my humble apologies for disturbing you at such a time...

original Spanish: En París solo durante 48 horas por negocios el joven marqués ocioso decide ir al cine.
original English: In Paris for 48 hours on business and quite alone the young Marquis at a loose end decides to go to the pictures.

original Spanish: Atormentado por los celos René vuelve a casa sin avisar con la intención de sorprender a su infiel esposa.
original English: Tormented by jealousy René returns home unannounced hoping to surprise his unfaithful wife.

original Spanish: Y René creyó haber tenido un mal sueño si no fuera por aquella maldita imagen que empujaba su brutal deseo de espiar y saber...
original English: And René would have believed it all a bad dream if the accursed image wasn't there to foster his brutal desire to spy and to know...

original Spanish: Le ruego que me permita abrazar a mi hermana Es cierto que cometí una grave falta siendo denunciado por mi familia y forzado al exilio.
original English: I beg you to allow me to embrace my sister. True I have committed a grave sin been denounced by my family and forced into exile.

original Spanish: De paso por Francia mi único deseo ha sido verla pero no nos hemos encontrado.
original English: Passing through France my only desire has been to see her but she has not kept our rendez-vous.

original Spanish: Pero Dios debía un milagro a Suzanne que solo velaba por el honor del apellido de quien ama...
original English: But she who had only stood by her beloved brother was saved...

original Spanish: Glaucus compra a la esclava Nidia para liberarla de los abusos de Stratonica.
original English: Glaucus buys the slave Nidia to free her from the abuses of Stratonica.

original Spanish: El oráculo proclamará por ti el juicio de aquéllos en los que pusiste tu confianza tu amor y tu honor.
original English: The oracle will announces to you the judgment of those in whom you have placed... your confidence your love and your honor .

original Spanish: Nidia se dirige al Templo de Isis a suplicar paz para su corazón.
original English: Nidia goes to the Temple of Isis to plead for peace to his heart.

original Spanish: Vuelve esta noche y te daré una poción de amor para Glaucus.
original English: Come back tonight and I'll give you a magic potion for Glaucus.

original Spanish: ¿Es para él...?
original English: And for him?

original Spanish: Nidia se da prisa para encontrar a Claudius.
original English: Nidia in a hurry to find Claudio.

original Spanish: Apoecides y culpó a Glaucus para deshacerse de un rival.
original English: Arbace killed Apoecides and blamed Glaucus to get rid of a rival.

original Spanish: No hay esperanza para Glaucus.
original English: There is no hope is for Glaucus.

original Spanish: Arbace hace venir a Nidia para que baile en la fiesta.
original English: Arbaces sends for Nydia to dance on the celebration.

original Spanish: Nidia se prepara para la danza.
original English: Nydia is preparing to dance.

original Spanish: Nidia teme por la suerte de Jone
original English: Nydia fears the worst for Ione.

original Spanish: No puedo dejarla en las garras de ese monstruo. Sería la muerte para Glauco.
original English: I won't leave her in the hands of this monster; it would be the death of Glaucus.

original Spanish: Giulia no se resigna a olvidar su amor por Glauco.
original English: Julia cannot forget because she still loves Glaucus.

original Spanish: Querido amigo sabemos que te casas con la bellísima Jone y por eso te invitamos a cenar para celebrar el último día de tu libertad.
original English: Dear friend We know that tomorrow you celebrate your wedding to the beautiful Ione. So we invite you to dinner and we shall celebrate your last day of freedom. Julia.

original Spanish: Querido amigo sabemos que te casas con la bellísima Jone y por eso te invitamos a cenar para celebrar el último día de tu libertad.
original English: Dear friend We know that tomorrow you celebrate your wedding to the beautiful Ione. So we invite you to dinner and we shall celebrate your last day of freedom. Julia.

original Spanish: Este milagroso filtro de amor encenderá en Glauco la pasión por mí.
original English: This magic potion will surely ignite Glaucus's unknown affections for me.

original Spanish: Nidia para obtener el amor de Glauco se apodera de la presunta poción de amor.
original English: To get the love of Glaucus Nydia steals the presumed love potion.

original Spanish: Arbace apuñala al sacerdote Menecro para cargar la culpa a Glauco.
original English: Arbaces stabs the priest Meneker and turns the suspicion to Glaucus.

original Spanish: Nidia usa la astucia para huir de su vigilante.
original English: Nydia uses a trick to escape from the guards.

original Spanish: Mis sótanos están llenos de tesoros. Todo lo que seas capaz de llevarte por su peso será tuyo.
original English: In my cellar there is plenty of gold what you can carry is yours.

original Spanish: Te prometo que denunciaré a Arbace por sus delitos y te liberaré.
original English: Promise you will turn Arbaces in for the crime he committed and I will set you free.

original Spanish: ¡Declárate culpable y serás liberado! De otro modo morirás en la arena devorado por las fieras.
original English: Confess your crime and you'll be saved otherwise you'll die in the arena by the wild beasts.

original Spanish: Salustio afligido por la pérdida del amigo trata de olvidar bebiendo.
original English: Sallust is saddened by the loss of his friend Glaucus and seeks comfort in wine.

original Spanish: Interpretada por Marcel Levesque del Palais Royal.
original English: Cine-farce performed by Marcel Levesque of the Palais Royal, the ladies Le Bret, Le Bruz, etc.

original Spanish: El agente Foezel lleva una vida tranquila con su esposa su suegra y su trabajo cuando un equipo de cine llega para filmar y descubre que en su equipaje sólo tiene dos pantalones de policía para tres actores.
original English: Police officer Foezel spent his days quietly with his wife his mother-in-law and his service when a troupe of filmmakers came to shoot nearby but it turned out there were only two pairs of trousers for three police officers in their luggage.

original Spanish: El agente Foezel lleva una vida tranquila con su esposa su suegra y su trabajo cuando un equipo de cine llega para filmar y descubre que en su equipaje sólo tiene dos pantalones de policía para tres actores.
original English: Police officer Foezel spent his days quietly with his wife his mother-in-law and his service when a troupe of filmmakers came to shoot nearby but it turned out there were only two pairs of trousers for three police officers in their luggage.

original Spanish: Tienen que conseguir otro pantalón aún pasando por la vergüenza de pedirlo.
original English: To escape this embarrassing situation they had to find another pair of trousers.

original Spanish: - - No ha dejado la llave para cerrar...
original English: Egad my key is in there!

original Spanish: - - Muy amable señor agente por prestarnos su pantalón.
original English: Thank you kindly for the borrowed trousers mister policeman.

original Spanish: Franca ha usado su talento de amazona para entrar en un circo ambulante donde actúa como "la Amazona Misteriosa".
original English: Franca has used her horse-riding talent... to join a travelling circus where she performs as 'The Masked Amazon.'

original Spanish: Mañana por la noche habrá una función de élite en el circo Milano.
original English: There's an elite performance at circus Milano tomorrow evening.

original Spanish: Al día siguiente Stérosky cumple lo prometido y da permiso a sus criados para irse.
original English: The next day Stérosky keeps his promise and gives his servants the day off.

original Spanish: Orden de arresto y deportación para la persona que señale Jean Stérosky... y confiscación de los documentos que lleve encima.
original English: Warrant to arrest and deport the person to be pointed out by Jean Stérosky... after confiscation of the papers in her possession.

original Spanish: ESPERANZAS AMENAZADAS Por primera vez en su vida los pensamientos del joven se apartan del camino marcado para él.
original English: For the first time in his life the young man's thoughts are swerving from the path marked out for him.

original Spanish: ESPERANZAS AMENAZADAS Por primera vez en su vida los pensamientos del joven se apartan del camino marcado para él.
original English: For the first time in his life the young man's thoughts are swerving from the path marked out for him.

original Spanish: Ocurrió hace muchos muchos años que en un reino junto al mar vivió una joven a quien quizá conozcáis por el nombre de Annabel Lee.
original English: It was many and many a year ago In a kingdom by the sea That a maiden lived whom you may know

original Spanish: Y aquella joven no vivía con otra idea que la de amar y ser amada por mí".
original English: By the name of Annabel Lee; And this maiden she lived with no other thought Than to love and be loved by me.

original Spanish: ¡Mira! Lo he sacrificado todo por ti y a cambio me debes unos años de agradecimiento.
original English: I have sacrificed everything for you and you owe me in return a few years of gratitude

original Spanish: Fuiste para mí amor mío cuanto mi alma anhelaba una isla verde en el mar amor mío una fuente y un altar".
original English: Thou wast that all to me love For whic my soul did pine A green isle in the sea love A fountain and a shrine.

original Spanish: Sospechando que el forastero es detective contrata al italiano para que monte guardia de día y de noche
original English: Suspicious that the stranger is a detective he hires the Italian to watch on guard night and day

original Spanish: Esto conduce a un pasadizo subterráneo por el que puedo escapar
original English: This leads to an underground passage which gives me means of escape

original Spanish: Dispongo de una hora para estar con usted si no le importa contestar a unas preguntas".
original English: I have an hour that I can spend with you if you don't mind answering a few questions.

original Spanish: Espera impaciente al amanecer para decirle que esté o no esté su tío ella no puede vivir sin él.
original English: She cannot wait until morning to tell him that Uncle or no Uncle she cannot live without him.

original Spanish: John Murdock es enviado a la mina para aprehender a los bandidos.
original English: John Murdock has been sent to the mine to apprehend the bandits.

original Spanish: Proporciónele toda ayuda precisa para solventar el asunto.
original English: Give him all assistance its clear the matter up.

original Spanish: Voy a echar un vistazo por los alrededores y a contactar con la batida en el cruce de caminos.
original English: I am going to take a look around and will meet the posse at the crossroads.

original Spanish: John explica su plan a Dora y la envía para que detenga a Lawler hasta que él llegue.
original English: John explains his plan to Dora and sends her back to detain Lawler until he arrives.

original Spanish: Para preservar la coherencia de la historia una secuencia faltante de éste film fue reemplazada por una secuencia extraída de otro film de la serie "Fantomas".
original English: To preserve the coherence of the story a missing sequence was replaced by an extracted sequence of another film of "Fantômas" series.

original Spanish: Para preservar la coherencia de la historia una secuencia faltante de éste film fue reemplazada por una secuencia extraída de otro film de la serie "Fantomas".
original English: To preserve the coherence of the story a missing sequence was replaced by an extracted sequence of another film of "Fantômas" series.

original Spanish: Después de repetidos fracasos para atrapar a Fantômas por el Inspector Juve una violenta campaña de prensa se desata dejando afuera a Jérôme Fantor periodista de "La Capitale" amigo y colaborador de la policía.
original English: Following the repeated failure of Inspector Juve in dealing with Fantômas a violent press campaign erupted which infuriated Jerome Fandor reporter for 'The Capital' and friend and collaborator of the policeman.

original Spanish: Después de repetidos fracasos para atrapar a Fantômas por el Inspector Juve una violenta campaña de prensa se desata dejando afuera a Jérôme Fantor periodista de "La Capitale" amigo y colaborador de la policía.
original English: Following the repeated failure of Inspector Juve in dealing with Fantômas a violent press campaign erupted which infuriated Jerome Fandor reporter for 'The Capital' and friend and collaborator of the policeman.

original Spanish: Convocado al Palacio de Justicia por la oficina del Juez de Instrucción Juve es notificado de la acusación.
original English: Summoned to the Halls of Justice in the office of the civic judge Juve finds himself under accusations.

original Spanish: Por favor un comunicado para los diarios.
original English: - Take down a statement for the papers.

original Spanish: Mientras Juve está en el Almacén será mejor que esté libre para trabajar por él y hacer justicia lo más pronto posible
original English: Forgive me for giving you the slip. While Juve is at the Station it is better that I am free to work on his behalf to see that justice is done as soon as possible. - Jerome Fandor

original Spanish: Mientras Juve está en el Almacén será mejor que esté libre para trabajar por él y hacer justicia lo más pronto posible
original English: Forgive me for giving you the slip. While Juve is at the Station it is better that I am free to work on his behalf to see that justice is done as soon as possible. - Jerome Fandor

original Spanish: Tengo otro trato que será tomado por el Sr. Paulet en el piso de arriba
original English: -I've got another bill to collect at Monsieur Paulet's on the floor above.

original Spanish: Esta persona desearía que un cuarto de su apartamento sea dividido en dos para tabicar. Su concerje.
original English: This person desires that one room of her apartment be divided in two by a partition.

original Spanish: En fin Señores Uds. no van a permitir perder prenda por un americano!
original English: - For heaven's sake gentlemen you are not going to let yourselves be shown up by an american!

original Spanish: El patrón me envía para reemplazarte.
original English: The boss sent me to replace you.

original Spanish: Los fondos serán recolectados por la gran duquesa Alexandra en su casa que lo ha abierto con 5.000 ffs.
original English: The money will be collected at the home of the grand duchess who will pay out a sum of 5000 francs.

original Spanish: Para el lanzamiento de la suscripción la gran duquesa daba un gran baile de máscara al cual Fandor hábil para todo desliz había decidido asistir.
original English: To launch the reward the grand duchess was giving a grand masked-ball which Fandor skilled at edging his way into anywhere had decided to attend.

original Spanish: Como gran alivio la gran duquesa nota que el muerto es un desconocido para ella
original English: To her great relief the grand duchess saw that the dead man was unknown to her.

original Spanish: Los había investigado uno por uno para encontrar la pista de Fantômas.
original English: He explored them one by one to find Fantômas's trail.

original Spanish: Los había investigado uno por uno para encontrar la pista de Fantômas.
original English: He explored them one by one to find Fantômas's trail.

original Spanish: La construccion de una nueva ala a lo largo del muelle de los Orfêvres había puesto patas arriba al palacio de Justicia invadido por los albañiles
original English: The construction of a new wing along the Orfevres Dock had turned the Halls of Justice upside down - they were overrun by builders.

original Spanish: Mas para resguardar la investigación su puesta en libertad deberá quedar en secreto.
original English: But so as not to hinder the research of that inspector his release must remain a secret. - Commissioner of Police.

original Spanish: Si eres Juve tanto peor para ti.
original English: If you are Juve so much the worse for you.

original Spanish: Son amigos disfrazados para la ocasión que estoy preparando
original English: They are some friends in disguise for a job I'm planning.

original Spanish: El bandido había hecho arrestar a sus cómplices para quedarse con el botín el solo... Y la suscripción para su arresto había reportado una enorme suma de dinero
original English: The criminal had had his accomplices arrested to keep the loot for himself And the reward for his arrest was a very large sum of money.

original Spanish: En el cuarto vecino de éste está ocupado por un sacerdote...
original English: The next-door room is occupied by a priest ...

original Spanish: Fandor le muestra a Juve el articulo escrito para "La Capitale
original English: Jerome Fandor shows to his friend inspector Juve an article which he had written for La Capitale

original Spanish: As. Fantômas condenado a muerte por la justicia belga por el asesinato cometido en Bélgica [ver ficha 163].
original English: Fantômas was sentenced by Belgian court to death for the murders committed in Belgium [see file 163].

original Spanish: As. Fantômas condenado a muerte por la justicia belga por el asesinato cometido en Bélgica [ver ficha 163].
original English: Fantômas was sentenced by Belgian court to death for the murders committed in Belgium [see file 163].

original Spanish: El bandido no dudará en regresar a Francia para reunirse con su banda.
original English: The bandit will not hesitate to return to France to join his band.

original Spanish: Condenado a muerte no habrá para él esta vez ninguna conmutación de pena.
original English: Sentenced to death this time there will be no commutation of sentence for him.

original Spanish: Juve se despide de Fandor y parte a Bélgica. Una noche en la prisión de Louvain Fantômas recibe un mensaje luminoso con el código secreto usado por la banda. Le avisan del plan organizado para su evasión.
original English: On one night in his prison in Louvain Fantômas receive a light message with secret code used by the band notifying him of organized plan for his escape.

original Spanish: Juve se despide de Fandor y parte a Bélgica. Una noche en la prisión de Louvain Fantômas recibe un mensaje luminoso con el código secreto usado por la banda. Le avisan del plan organizado para su evasión.
original English: On one night in his prison in Louvain Fantômas receive a light message with secret code used by the band notifying him of organized plan for his escape.

original Spanish: Aquel de aquella celda por ejemplo?
original English: For example from this cell?

original Spanish: Oculto bajo un pasillo Fantômas viste un traje de ciudad dejado por Juve.
original English: Hidden beneath an aisle Fantômas changed into clothes left by Juve.

original Spanish: Entró a Francia por Nantes después de un prudente desvío por Inglaterra creyendo haberse desligado de los policías que seguían sus pasos.
original English: He arrived to France through Nantes after making a carefull detour over England believing to have detached all officers who followed his footsteps.

original Spanish: Entró a Francia por Nantes después de un prudente desvío por Inglaterra creyendo haberse desligado de los policías que seguían sus pasos.
original English: He arrived to France through Nantes after making a carefull detour over England believing to have detached all officers who followed his footsteps.

original Spanish: Fantômas aprovechará su paso por Londres para procurarse un nuevo maquillaje.
original English: Fantômas' passage through London gave him the chance to obtain a new mask.

original Spanish: Fantômas aprovechará su paso por Londres para procurarse un nuevo maquillaje.
original English: Fantômas' passage through London gave him the chance to obtain a new mask.

original Spanish: Palacio de Justicia. Confirmamos por la la presente Vtra. nominación al cargo de Juez de St.-Calais (Sarthe) en reemplazo del Sr.Juez Morel ahora en retiro.
original English: We are confirming your nomination for the office of Examining Judge at Saint-Calais (Sarthe) in place of Mr.Judge Morel now in retirement.

original Spanish: Joyas Tergall: Ocultas por Rilomans en la Iglesia de Bouloire.
original English: Hidden by Rilomans at the Church Bouloire.

original Spanish: Ud. ha asesinado a su marido para heredar su fortuna y gastarla con su amante.
original English: You have murdered your husband to inherit his fortune and spend it with your lover.

original Spanish: Escoltado por la Gendarmería será puesto a disposición del Juzgado de St.-Calais.
original English: Escorted by Gendarmerie he will be made available to the Court in Saint-Calais.

original Spanish: Paulet y el Alumno y otros miembros de la banda fueron arrestados por vagabundos.
original English: Paulet and Eleve the other gang members were arrested for vagrancy.

original Spanish: El hombre por el que pregunta esta carta nunca debe llegar aqui.
original English: The man mentioned in this letter must never get here. Get rid of him!

original Spanish: Todos están guarnecidos de cintas de papel para el encogimiento menos uno que lleva la marca de un sombrerero de Louvain precisamente la ciudad en la que
original English: All are trimmed with paper strips to make them shrink. One hat bears a mark of a hatter in Louvain the very city in which Juve is in jail in place of Fantomas.

original Spanish: Intrigado por la indulgencia del extraño juez Pradier por dos vagabundos Fandor había ido a la Guardia reconociendo a Paulet y el Pupilo de la banda de Fantômas.
original English: Intrigued by the strange indulgence of the judge Pradier regarding the two vagabonds Fandor went to investigate the matter. He recognises Paulet and Eleve two members of the Fantômas band.

original Spanish: Informado por su diario de la extradicción del prisionero de Louvain y adivinando el plan de Fantômas el periodista decide poner a los dos maleantes fuera de juego.
original English: Informed of the extradition of the prisoner from Louvain and guessing Fantômas' plan the journalist decides to put the two rogues out of play.

original Spanish: Puedo informar que Fantômas el famoso bandido traído de Louvain llegará esta noche a la Estación de Conneré y llevado por la ruta a la prisión de Saint-Calais-FANDOR
original English: Journal La Capitale. I can report that Fantômas the famous bandit brought to Louvain will arrive tonight at Conneran Station and will be taken by the route to the prison in Saint-Calais FANDOR

original Spanish: Por la buena marcha de la investigación del asunto Ribonard y para evitar una posible confrontación y además para proteger la vida del prisionero extraditado de Louvain importará que no sea visto en persona.
original English: For the convenience of the investigation of the Ribonard case and to avoid confrontation and also to protect the life of the prisoner extradited from Louvain it is desirable he is not seen by anyone.

original Spanish: Para esto luego de su arribo todas las puertas interiores y exteriores de St.-Calais serán clausuradas y custodiadas por gendarmes.
original English: For this after his arrival all interior doors and exterior doors of Saint-Calais will be closed and guarded by gendarmes.

original Spanish: Winsor McCay le apuesta a George McManus una cena para el grupo a que puede hacer revivir al Dinosaurio por medio de una serie de viñetas dibujadas a mano.
original English: Winsor McCay bets George McManus dinner for the group he can... bring the Dinosaur back to life through a series of hand-drawn vignettes.

original Spanish: Winsor McCay le apuesta a George McManus una cena para el grupo a que puede hacer revivir al Dinosaurio por medio de una serie de viñetas dibujadas a mano.
original English: Winsor McCay bets George McManus dinner for the group he can... bring the Dinosaur back to life through a series of hand-drawn vignettes.

original Spanish: ¡No te preocupes por la serpiente marina!
original English: Do not worry about the sea serpent!

original Spanish: Gertie adora la música. Tocad para ella y bailará.
original English: Gertie loves music play for her and dance.

original Spanish: Producida por "CINES-FILM-MIJ" de ROMA
original English: Produced by "CINEMA-FILM-MIJ" Rome

original Spanish: Más agradable que la ruidosa fiesta es para el joven CayoJulio la compañía de la amable Servilia la más joven de la poderosa familia de Catón...
original English: Julius Caesar finds Servilia the kindest and youngest of the powerful Cato family More pleasant than the noisy party of young people...

original Spanish: Con la despreocupación de su juventud se entregan por completo al entretenimiento  y al goce del amor.
original English: The insouciance of youth takes completely for granted the entertainment  and the enjoyment of love.

original Spanish: La estricta disciplina que reina en la familia de Servilia es la razón por la que Cayo Julio sólo puede encontrarse con su ser querido al amparo de la oscuridad.
original English: The strict discipline that prevails in Servilia's family is the reason that Julius can only see his beloved under cover of darkness.

original Spanish: Ante el altar de la diosa hacen votos de fidelidad eterna y su su matrimonio secreto es bendecido por un sacerdote.
original English: Before the altar of the goddess they take vows of eternal fidelity and their secret marriage is blessed by a priest.

original Spanish: No es por mí... ¡... lo de nuestro hijo!
original English: It's not for me ... think of our son!

original Spanish: ... ¡Tengo que vivir por nuestro hijo!
original English: I have to live for our son!

original Spanish: Va a ser un honor para mí hacerle frente.
original English: It will be an honor for me to bear it.

original Spanish: Esto por desgracia te puede costar la vida.
original English: This unfortunately could cost you your life.

original Spanish: ¿Tú por aquí Cayo Julio?
original English: Are you here Julius?

original Spanish: En casa de Tertullia la mujer de Craso se reúnen los amigos y partidarios de Cayo Julio para preparar su elección como cónsul.
original English: At the home of Tertullian the wife of Crassus where the friends and supporters of Gaius Julius meet for his election as consul.

original Spanish: Cayo Julio se gana a Pompeyo para sus grandes planeses decir su elección como cónsul y para el mando supremo de las legiones romanas.
original English: Julius tells Pompey of his great plans i.e. his election as consul and control of the Roman legions.

original Spanish: Tertullia se adelanta a Cayo Julio que regresa a Roma con sus invencibles legiones de Iberia (la España moderna) para ser la primera en saludarle como futuro cónsul.
original English: Tertullian is going on ahead to meet Julius who is returning to Rome with his invincible legions from Iberia (Modern Spain) to be the first to greet him as a future consul.

original Spanish: Cayo Julio que acaricia desde hace mucho tiempo su plan de utilizar las legiones romanas para penetrar aún más en la tierra de los galos
original English: Julius who long cherished a plan to use the Roman legions to penetrate even into the land of the Gauls

original Spanish: (las actuales Francia y Bélgica) gana a Pompeyo para este plan.
original English: (Modern France and Belgium) enlisted Pompey to help win acceptance of this plan.

original Spanish: Él le concede a su última hija Julia por esposa.
original English: He gave his last daughter Julia to Pompey as his wife.

original Spanish: Las gloriosas campañas y lo mucho hecho por Cayo Julio en interés de la República son minimizadas por los educadores de su hijo Bruto y presentadas como hostiles a la República.
original English: The glorious campaigns and how much Julius aided the interests of the Republic are minimized by Brutus's teachers who presented Julius as hostile to the Republic.

original Spanish: Tertullia se sacrifica por César.
original English: Tertullian sacrifices herself for Caesar.

original Spanish: Los druidas (sacerdotes y sacerdotisas galas) hacen sacrificios a los dioses y oran para que protejan a las 38 tribus galas frente a la la dominación de los romanos.
original English: Druids (Powerful priests and priestesses) make sacrifices to the gods and pray that they will protect the 38 Gallic tribes against domination by the Romans.

original Spanish: Quiere cortarse el brazo que fue demasiado débil para llevar el acero asesino.
original English: She wants to cut off her arm because it was too weak to bear the knife to kill him.

original Spanish: ¡Daré mi vida por la patria!
original English: I will give my life for the fatherland!

original Spanish: El asedio de Alessia por las legiones romanas.
original English: Alesia's siege by Roman legions.

original Spanish: Refuerzos galos llegan por un camino secreto a la ciudad sitiada por los romanos.
original English: Gallic reinforcements arrive by a secret path. The city is besieged by the Romans.

original Spanish: Refuerzos galos llegan por un camino secreto a la ciudad sitiada por los romanos.
original English: Gallic reinforcements arrive by a secret path. The city is besieged by the Romans.

original Spanish: El comandante galo ordenó a sus diferentes capitanes que enviaran mensajeros a todas las tribus galas para socorrer a Alessia.
original English: The commander orders the Gallic captains to send messengers to all the tribes to send aid to Alesia.

original Spanish: Uno de los mensajeros es capturado por los romanos.
original English: One of the messengers is captured by the Romans.

original Spanish: Con las primeras luces del alba los galos están listos para asaltar el campamento romano.
original English: At the first light of dawn the Gauls are ready to storm the Roman camp.

original Spanish: Guiada por el heróico Camulogenes llega la vanguardia gala cerca de las fortificaciones levantadas por los romanos.
original English: Guided by the heroic Camulogenes the force approaches the edge of the fortifications erected by the Romans.

original Spanish: Con enorme esfuerzo los galos consiguen hacer huir por un tiempo a los guerreros romanos pero al final tienen que retirarse los valientes ante César.
original English: With great effort the Gauls escape for a short time from the Roman warriors  But in the end they are captured and taken before Caesar.

original Spanish: En vano buscan los galos refugio en Alessia  por la noche esta fortaleza está en poder de los romanos.
original English: The Gauls vainly seek refuge in Alesia   but the fortress is in the hands of the Romans by nightfall.

original Spanish: La mayoría de los miembros del Senado votan para privar a César de su condición de cónsul.
original English: Most Senate members vote to deprive Caesar of his status as consul.

original Spanish: Mis legiones llevarán por sí mismas su respuesta al Senado... ¡... Y no temáis!
original English: My legions will themselves respond to the Senate  And do not be afraid ...

original Spanish: Vuestra vida es sagrada para mí.
original English: Your life is sacred to me.

original Spanish: Esta vida es sagrada para mí.
original English: This life is sacred to me.

original Spanish: En Roma reina una gran conmoción por el avance de Julio César y sus legiones.
original English: In Rome there was great commotion about the progress of Julius Caesar and his legions.

original Spanish: Con temor y con alegría Julio César es aclamado por el pueblo romano.
original English: With fear and joy Julius Caesar is acclaimed by the Roman people.

original Spanish: Sin escuchar las palabras del guardián del templo César profana el templo de Saturno y toma el tesoro para proporcionar alimentos a sus tropas.
original English: Without listening to the words of the temple guardians Caesar profanes the temple of Saturn and takes the treasure to provide food for his troops.

original Spanish: Quiero que sigas vivo por la patria.
original English: I want you to live for the homeland.

original Spanish: Muestran a César la cabeza de Pompeyo que fue finalmente asesinado por el rey Ptolomeo.
original English: Show Caesar Pompey's head which was finally taken by King Ptolemy.

original Spanish: No quiero que los miembros del Senado sean vigilados por mis soldados como si fueran enemigos.
original English: I do not want members of the Senate to be watched by my soldiers as if they were enemies.

original Spanish: Servilia está preocupada por el ruimor de la calle.
original English: Servilia is worried by rumors in the street.

original Spanish: El entusiasmo de la multitud llega a su clímax cuando Marco Antonio lee el testamento de César por el que sus bienes son legados al pueblo.
original English: The enthusiasm of the crowd reaches its climax when Marc Anthony reads Caesar's will which provides for the assets to be bequeathed to the people.

original Spanish: Volví a mi casa encantado y convencido de que por su perfecta moralidad ella merecía ser mi mujer.
original English: I returned home enchanted and convinced of her perfect morality. She deserved to be my wife.

original Spanish: Los niños eran también para nosotros pretexto para peleas.
original English: The children for us were a pretext for fights too.

original Spanish: Insistí para que viniera la misma tarde con su violín.
original English: I insisted that he came the same evening with his violin.

original Spanish: Eso fue agradable para mí.
original English: That was pleasant for me.

original Spanish: Tuya para siempre.
original English: Yours forever.

original English: Story by Richard Oswald directed by William Wauer

original Spanish: De todas partes llueven monedas en agradecimiento por la música y el baile.
original English: From all sides it's raining coins as thanks for music and dance.

original Spanish: El posadero indica al juglar su alojamiento para la noche.
original English: The landlord shows the fiddler is room.

original Spanish: ¡Músico por el amor de mi pobre y enferma esposa...! ¡Toca alguna cosita con tu violín!
original English: Fiddler for the sake of my poor ill wife play just a little bit on your violin.

original Spanish: La esposa del juglar ha seguido las huellas del desparecido con su hijo Arpad y se ha quedado a vivir en el pueblo donde estuvo el músico por última vez.
original English: The fiddler's wife has followed the trail of the missing man with her son Arpad and stayed to live in the village where the fiddler had last paused.

original Spanish: Un rico campesino le pide para su hijo la mano de Aranka.
original English: A rich farmer sollicits for Aranka for his son.

original Spanish: El posadero se siente muy afortunado por la proposición.
original English: The landlord is overjoyed with the proposal.

original Spanish: Adaptada para el cine y escenificada por William Wauer
original English: Adapted for the screen and directed by William Wauer.

original English: Adapted for the screen and directed by William Wauer.

original Spanish: El concierto inaugural del Madison Square Palace construido por el arquitecto Hobby constituyó el punto culminante de la temporada neoyorquina.
original English: The opening concert of the Madison Square Palace built by the architect Hobby is the highlight of the season in New York.

original Spanish: Una propaganda inmensa pregonaba a la empresa por todo el mundo.
original English: An immense promotion announced the undertaking to the world.

original Spanish: Los bancos y los capitalistas se mataban por las acciones.
original English: Banks and capitalists scrambled for shares.

original Spanish: Era una carrera por un camino de piedras.
original English: He raced his way through the rock mass.

original Spanish: Un proceso de los reclamados contra Allan por la opinión pública fue rechazado por falta de motivos.
original English: A trial against Allan as demanded by the public was dismissed due to a lack of arguments.

original Spanish: Amargado abandonado por todos se retiró Allan a los lugares vacíos creados por él aunque Ethel se esforzaba en arrancarle su melancolía.
original English: Feeling embittered and lonely Allan returned to the empty sites of his work although Ethel was trying to pull him out of his misery.

original Spanish: Allan se prometió y se casó con Ethel Lloyd para poder completar por fin el gigantesco plan como hijo político del hombre más rico del mundo.
original English: Allan married Ethel Lloyd and as the world's richest man's son-in-law was finally able to finish the colossal plan.

original Spanish: Allan se prometió y se casó con Ethel Lloyd para poder completar por fin el gigantesco plan como hijo político del hombre más rico del mundo.
original English: Allan married Ethel Lloyd and as the world's richest man's son-in-law was finally able to finish the colossal plan.

original Spanish: En una lucha incansable los trabajadores se abrían paso adelante por una gruta insoportable cada vez más y más caliente.
original English: With great effort the workers advanced into the increasingly hotter caves.

original Spanish: La baronesa de Troixmond (Filibus) lee un artículo de gran interés para ella en el periódico.
original English: The baroness de Troixmonde (Filibus) reads an article of great interest to her in the paper.

original Spanish: Recompensa por descubrir al misterioso Filibus.
original English: A reward for tracking down the mysterious Filibus.

original Spanish: El banquero Robertson cuyo banco fue robado hace poco ofrece 25.000 florines por la captura de Filibus.
original English: Banker Robertson whose bank was recently mysteriously robbed offers 25000 for the capture of Filibus.

original Spanish: El detective Hardy pide la ayuda de quien pueda aportar cualquier pista o información para entregársela al notario Desmond.
original English: Detective Hardy asks anyone who can provide any clue or information to report to notary Desmond.

original Spanish: El detective sigue mi rastro para atraparme...
original English: The detective has taken charge of tracking me down.

original Spanish: Yo también soy un poco... detective privado amateur. ¿Me permitiría aspirar a la recompensa ofrecida por el banquero Robertson?
original English: I am a bit of an amateur detective... is it permitted to compete for the reward offered by banker Robertson?

original Spanish: La baronesa de Troixmond también se interesa por el misterioso robo del banco.
original English: Baroness Troixmonde has come to make enquiries about the mysterious bank robbery too.

original Spanish: Con un heliófrafo (un dispositivo telegráfico activado por la luz del sol) ordena que quiere subir y a una altitud de dos mil metros sigue incubando su plan...
original English: I want to ascend and at an altitude of 2000 meters she continues hatching her plan...

original Spanish: Es usted un amigo para mí nada más.
original English: You are only a friend to me but nothing more.

original Spanish: Mientras la baronesa Troximond inicia sus planes para "demostrar" que Hardy es el misterioso Filibus.
original English: And Baroness Troixmonde puts her plans into action to prove that Hardy is the mysterious Filibus.

original Spanish: Hardy oculta una pequeña pequeña cámara fotográfica en el hueco del ojo y cambia el diamante auténtico por uno falso.
original English: A tiny photo camera is hidden in the eye socket and the real diamond switched for a fake.

original Spanish: Si me firma un cheque por un millón lo dejo en una isla desierta.
original English: If you sign me a cheque of one million...

original Spanish: Leo Sandy se apresura para ver al magistrado y salvar a su amigo.
original English: Leo Sandy hastens to the magistrate to save his friend.

original Spanish: Tras este testimonio queda usted libre para que pueda apresar a Filibus y probar así su inocencia.
original English: After this testimony I can allow you to go free for now that you can find the real Filibus and prove your innocence.

original Spanish: Filibus forja su plan más audaz: drogar a Hardy en su villa para saquear el banco internacional y acusarlo del robo.
original English: Filibus forges a bold plan: To drug Detective Hardy in his villa to loot the international bank and to accuse him of the robbery.

original Spanish: Y así el misterioso Filibus se mueve para forjar nuevos planes...
original English: And so the mysterious Filibus moves on... to forge new plans...

original Spanish: Este filme foi telecinado a velocidade de 24 quadros por segundo o que acelera o seu movimento original.
original English: This film was telecined at a speed of 24 frames per second which accelerates it from its original motion.

original Spanish: Na época se filmava a 16-18 quadros por segundo.
original English: At that time they filmed with 16-18 frames per second.

original Spanish: Este filme fue telecinado a la velocidad de 24 cuadros por segundo lo que acelera el movimiento original.

original Spanish: Mas no es óbice para que Lucia y su amado juegan al gárgaro en los jardines de San Malandrino.
original English: But it is not an obstacle for Lucia and his beloved play the gargoyle in the gardens of San Malandrino.

original Spanish: Y atraidos por el prestigio de Leandro excursionistas Caraqueños llegan a Guaracabulla a gozar de los toros.
original English: And attracted by Leandro's prestige visitors from Caracas arrive at Guaracabulla to enjoy bullfighting.

original Spanish: Y Ño Leandro por fin se resolvio de un modo encantador: tan halagueño que ya daba por hecho que era el dueño de la ciudad que pinto Bisturi.
original English: And Leandro finally made a decision in a charming way: so flattered he already assumed that he was the owner of the City that Bisturio described.

original Spanish: Y convencido por los traviesos caraqueños Don Leandro se despide y pone rumbo a la ciudad del Avila.
original English: And convinced by the naughty people from Caracas Don Leandro says goodbye and heads for the City of Avila.

original Spanish: Ya Don Leandro está en Caracas el placer le desespera y es claro va a la chivera a cambiar su capotera por chaquet y por casaca.
original English: Already Don Leandro is in Caracas the pleasure despairs him and it is clear He goes to a store to change his coat for a jacket.

original Spanish: Fulminado por el amor de Don Leandro Agripina la reina del couplet acude a una cita.
original English: Blasted by the love of Don Leandro Agrippina the couplet queen goes on a date.

original Spanish: Si Agripina yo lo imploro de su hidalga compasion arráncame el corazón o quiéreme por que te adoro.
original English: Yes Agripina I beg for your noble mercy take my heart away or love me because I adore you.

original Spanish: Hombre prevendo vale por diez...
original English: A warned man is worth ten...

original Spanish: Valiente sorpresa para final de una juerga.
original English: A gallant surprise for the end of the party.

original Spanish: Raffaele está atormentado ya que se siente suplantado por Michele.
original English: Raffaele is troubled because Michele has replaced him.

original Spanish: ¡Has arruinado a mi hijo para toda la vida!
original English: You've ruined my child's whole life!

original Spanish: ... ¡y ahí dentro he mentido para salvarlo!
original English: ... And I lied to save him!

original English: Federigo Funelli the scribe of the court is interested in Assunta.

original Spanish: No se trata de eso... para usted..." "¡Entonces muchas gracias!
original English: It is not that ... for you ..." "So thank you very much !

original English: And he waited for his beloved granddaughter to return from her walk in the woods with a mischievous smile as always.

original Spanish: Nuestras tierras son demasiado pequeñas para nuestro ejército. Debemos declararle la guerra a nuestros vecinos.
original English: Our lands are too small for our forces We must wage war on our neighbours

original Spanish: El oficial aduanero se preparaba para la inspección.
original English: The customs officer was preparing for the inspection.

original Spanish: Por miedo a ser descubiertos Hornung y Birger deciden quemar las mercancías en la cueva para eliminar las pruebas del tráfico.
original English: For fear of being discovered Hornung and Birger decide Burn the goods in the cave to eliminate evidence of trafficking.

original Spanish: '¡Señor jefe de la policía! Hace 15 años que murió el antiguo aduanero intentando arrestar a Hornung y a su hijo por contrabando.
original English: The former customs officer died 15 years ago trying to arrest Hornung and his son for smuggling.

original Spanish: Tendrán que abrir para no axfisiarse.
original English: They'll have to open it to avoid suffocation.

original Spanish: Venga mañana por la tarde al Café Kaiser.
original English: Come tomorrow afternoon to Cafe'Kaiser.

original English: An intelligent young man wanted for housework... in a grand house at Hohenzollerndamm 117th

original Spanish: ¿Tiene ropa usada para vender?
original English: Do you have any old clothes to sell?

original Spanish: Agotado por el esfuerzo mental.
original English: Exhausted by the mental strain.

original Spanish: Nos encontramos por fin cara a cara.
original English: At last we meet face to face.

original Spanish: Jadwiga despreocupada por los celos del Conde Bronislaw ...le pide al Dr. Hart llevarla a los fuegos artificiales en la terraza.
original English: Jadwiga unconcerend about count Bronislaw's jealousy ...asks Dr. Hart to take her to the firework on the terrace.

original Spanish: El viejo Panje quiere prevenir a los cosacos de envenenar los pozosdel pueblo y es vencido por ellos.
original English: Old Panje wants to prevent the cossacks from poisoning the village wells and is beaten up by them.

original Spanish: La esposa de Panje trae al doctor alemán para ayudar.
original English: The wife of old Panje brings the German doctor to help.

original English: 1 pancake for 4-6 persons

original English: The fleeing Russians are apprehended by German dragoons.

original Spanish: El tren hospital V. 12" fundado por Ursula deja el hogar.
original English: The hospital train "V. 12" founded by Ursula leaves home.

original Spanish: El doctor Hart está a cargo del funcionamiento del castillo Bransky por la presente el hospital principal.
original English: The army doctor Hart is charged with the operation of the castle Bransky field hospital hereby main hospital.

original Spanish: El "tren hospital V. 12" ha llegado para transportar los heridos del hospital a casa.
original English: The hospital train "V. 12" has arrived to transport wounded from the field hospital to home.

original Spanish: No solo eso será para él.
original English: She’s not just a beauty.

original Spanish: Así el perro aprovechó la ocasión para matarla.
original English: Then dog demon took his chance to kill the goat demon.

original Spanish: Muchas gracias por salvarnos la vida.
original English: Thanks for saving our lives.

original Spanish: No tenemos problemas ¿y para qué peleamos?
original English: What's the point of fighting?

original Spanish: No tenemos ningún lugar para vivir.
original English: We've got nowhere to go.

original Spanish: Haz todo lo posible para asistir a tu marido de ahí que cumplas tu sueño.
original English: You can do your best to assist your husband and realize your long-cherished dream.

original Spanish: Ordeno que te marches de inmediato a Zhaoge para elegir un emperador sabio observando las reglas de la naturaleza.
original English: I want you to go down the mountain as fast as you can. Go to Zhaoge and choose a wise king to perform the ways of heaven.

original Spanish: He aquí la bandera amarilla. Sirve para convocar viento y lluvia.
original English: This is the Xinghuang flag which can be used to call the wind and rain.

original Spanish: Dado que las fuerzas de élite están dispersas por todas las partes los vasallos aprovechan la oportunidad para rebelarse contra la realeza.
original English: The best troops were divided. This gives an opportunity to more than eight hundred vassals to raise rebellions.

original Spanish: Dado que las fuerzas de élite están dispersas por todas las partes los vasallos aprovechan la oportunidad para rebelarse contra la realeza.
original English: The best troops were divided. This gives an opportunity to more than eight hundred vassals to raise rebellions.

original Spanish: Solo se necesita un año para detener la guerra.
original English: It only takes one year to quell conflicts.

original Spanish: Es para una proposición de matrimonio.
original English: Propose marriage.

original Spanish: Al regresar construirá el pabellón de estrella para Su Daji se celebrará la boda se dará un gran banquete y amnistiará a todos.
original English: After returning to the kingdom Kill will build the Star Viewing Platform for Su Daji to hold a grand wedding ceremony. And he will invite all guests and grant amnesty for the public.

original Spanish: Antes de entrar en el palacio le habíamos prometido a hermana que no chuparíamos a la gente para evitar la fuga de la aura de espíritu.
original English: Before we entered the palace we promised sister that we will not eat people's spirits and give out evil spirit.

original Spanish: No quieres hacer nada por perezoso.
original English: You are going to drag your feet.

original Spanish: Pero gran hermano todavía espero ser santificado por esta misión.
original English: But big bro I am hoping that after completing the mission I will be awarded as a God and a saint.

original Spanish: Cuando mi padre observaba el cielo por la noche se enteró de que un sabio estaba pescando en la orilla del río Wei.
original English: My father was observing the sky at night and found that a sage is fishing on the bank of the Wei River.

original Spanish: Ya está para usted.
original English: I have prepared it.

original Spanish: Acéptelo por favor.
original English: Please enjoy it.

original Spanish: ¿No es ese pecador que fue detenido por el rey de Shang?
original English: Is not he the guilty minister who was detained by King Zhou?

original Spanish: Camino por el camino de justicia y nunca me asocio con pecadores.
original English: I am obedient to the rule of the God. I will not be with criminals.

original Spanish: Venimos aquí para encontrar el aura de los espíritus
original English: We are here to find evil spirit.

original Spanish: en el banquete con los marqués más tarde para recuperar el derecho militar y para pacificar la guerra lo antes posible.
original English: Bring the military power back to the central. Settle the war as soon as possible.

original Spanish: Felicitaciones por el gran matrimonio del rey y la concubina.
original English: Congratulations to Your Majesty and Noble Consort on the wedding.

original Spanish: Yo tengo un asunto para debatir con ustedes.
original English: I have a matter to discuss with you all.

original Spanish: Yo quiero llamar a los militares condecorados en los cuarteles que regresen al cortés para que pueda distribuirlos bajo un control centralizado.
original English: I want to bring the elite troops back to the capital and conduct unified deployment.

original Spanish: Yo miré al cielo por la noche y vi que había aura de demonio estaba cubriendo el palacio.
original English: I observed the sky at night and found that evil spirit surrounds the palace.

original Spanish: Yo siempre estoy al lado del rey solo para consultar los asuntos del país con el rey.
original English: When I am with Your Majesty I only discuss about the kingdom affairs with Your Majesty.

original Spanish: No tengo la intención para atraer al rey.
original English: I have no intention of seducing Your Majesty.

original Spanish: Yo Boyikao en nombre de Xi QI tributo diez coches de tesoro para felicitar el matrimonio de rey.
original English: I Bo Yikao the son of a guilty minister. I'm on behalf of Xiqi City bring ten carriages of treasures as tribute to congratulate Your Majesty.

original Spanish: Le ruego que usted sea misericordioso y perdone a mi padre para que él pueda regresar.
original English: Your Majesty Please be merciful. Grant amnesty and a new life to my father. Please allow us to return to our country.

original Spanish: También es piedad que rindes tributos por la expiación de tu padre.
original English: You pay tribute to atone for your father's sins. This is a filial affection.

original Spanish: Antes de irte ¿puedes adivinar para mi y la concubina Su?
original English: Before you leave how about reading the fortune of Noble Consort Su and me?

original English: You can't expect your redemption from the love for your child?" "I don't know Pierre I only know I adore you.

original Spanish: Tu primer beso fue para mí...
original English: Your first kiss was for me...

original Spanish: -- ¡Si pudiera morir por vos!

original Spanish: - - Con tanta alegría por esa piel de tigre te olvidas de que estoy aquí.

original English: The Manihiki monarch took his life with his own hands.

original Spanish: Yo blando el látigo de Menippus azoto las debilidades las costumbres y vicios de mi tiempo y para los espíritus sanos del mundo canto la canción del primer amor.
original English: - I wield a Menippus's whip which I use to scourge lust weakness and customs and vices of my time; and to promote health to the spirits To the world I sang the song of first love.

original Spanish: Todos los hombres de corazón para abajo son como yo: bestias".
original English: - Do not suffer. Here all men are like me: beasts.

original Spanish: Era mío era para mí".

original Spanish: Te privo de ella no para ofenderte sino para defenderte".
original English: - I'll make your hair short not to offend you but to protect you.

original Spanish: Todos los hombres de corazón para abajo son como yo: ¡bestias!
original English: - Do not suffer. Here all men are like me: beasts.

original Spanish: Alba sonríe embriagada por su juventud.
original English: Alba smiles intoxicated by her youth.

original Spanish: Tristano olvida su arrogancia para defender la causa de su hermano.
original English: Tristano overcomes his pride to save his brother's life.

original Spanish: Hilde Warren famosa actriz halagada por la vida y muy especialmente por Hans von Wengraf director teatral y su tenaz admirador
original English: Hilde Warren famous actress is happy with life ... and especially with Hans von Wengraf a theatrical director and ardent admirer

original Spanish: Hector recoge a Hilde para ir a casarse
original English: Hector takes Hilde to be married.

original Spanish: Hilde se traslada al campo para criar a su hijo
original English: Hilde moves to the countryside to raise her son.

original Spanish: Hilde no acepta la propuesta de Hans... y le pide fuerzas a Dios para ser una buena madre
original English: Hilde refuses Hans's request ... and asks God to make her a good mother.

original Spanish: Egon como su padre necesita siempre más dinero para sus placeres
original English: Egon like his father needs lots of money for his pleasures.

original Spanish: Entre mayo de 1916 y octubre de 1917 Chaplin produjo sus mejores comedias cortas como series para la "Mutual Film Corporation
original English: Between May 1916 and October 1917 Chaplin produced his finest short comedies as a series for the Mutual Film Corporation.

original Spanish: El inmigrante" fue la onceava película de Charlie Chaplin en la serie de 12 comedias para la "Mutual" siendo estrenada el 17 de junio de 1917.
original English: The Immigrant was Charlie Chaplin's eleventh film in his series of twelve Mutual comedies being first released on June 17 1917.

original Spanish: Tal era el perfeccionismo de Chaplin en ese momento que fueron tomados 90.000 pies de negativos para la producción y Charlie estuvo 4 días y 4 noches sin descansar mientras editaba la copia final de "El inmigrante".
original English: Such were Chaplin's demands for perfection by this time that 90.000 feet of negative was photographed for the production and Charlie went four days and nights without rest while editing The Immigrant to final lenght.

original Spanish: Un café para la señora.
original English: Coffee for the lady.

original Spanish: BAZAR DE BENEFICENCIA ENTRADA para el Sr. Henri van Reinhoven
original English: charity bazaar Ticket of admission for sir Henri van Reinhoven

original Spanish: Querido Rudolf necesito urgentemente una gran cantidad y para ello necesito un avalista.
original English: Dear Rudolf I need a large sum right away and require a surety.

original Spanish: ¿Lulu... así agradeces todo lo que he hecho por ti?
original English: Lulu... is this the thanks for all I've done for you? Did you forget how I so to speak picked you up from the street?

original Spanish: El equipaje es comprobado por los funcionarios de aduanas.
original English: The clerks check the luggage.

original Spanish: Muy señor mío: Quiero darle las gracias de nuevo por el servicio que me ha prestado.
original English: Dear sir For your services rendered to me I wish to thank you once more.

original Spanish: Espero verte pronto aquí para que seas testigo de mi felicidad.
original English: I hope that I shall see you here soon to be witness of my happiness.

original Spanish: ¡Mañana por la mañana lo haré hablar con Ud.!
original English: Tomorrow morning I will speak further with you!

original Spanish: Sólo por una lista he dado con el secreto de Lulu".
original English: Only by a trick can I find out Lulu's secret.

original Spanish: ¡Recogí a Lulu de la calle una artista hecha a si misma y que por su dinero me abandonó!
original English: I've picked Lulu up from the street made an artist of her and for the sake of your money she has left me!

original Spanish: Aquí está cubierto por Wang Yang.
original English: This area is covered by ocean.

original Spanish: Ahora Yan Luo del Beihai ha liderado a todos sus barcos piratas para actuar. invadir nuestro mar.
original English: Now the North Sea Yama has led all his pirate ships out to invade our waters and point their swords at our Wuji City.

original Spanish: Prepárate para la batalla.
original English: Get ready for battle!

original Spanish: Si golpeamos la derecha la fuerza de girar a la izquierda causada por el viento con el poder horizontal de la corriente no podemos movernos.
original English: If we make the right full rudder the left deflection moment caused by the wind plus the lateral force of the accompanying current will make us unable to move at all.

original Spanish: Esto significa que por lo menos existe un terreno así en el mundo.
original English: It suggests that there is one such land in the world at least.

original Spanish: Pero hay que pasar por el mar de la muerte extremadamente peligrosa para llegar
original English: [Farming land] [Wood] But you must pass through the extremely dangerous Waters of Death [Minerals] to arrive.

original Spanish: Pero hay que pasar por el mar de la muerte extremadamente peligrosa para llegar
original English: [Farming land] [Wood] But you must pass through the extremely dangerous Waters of Death [Minerals] to arrive.

original Spanish: ¿No quieres saber por qué venimos a buscarte?
original English: Don't you want to know why we are looking for you?

original Spanish: para manipular mi trabajo para ustedes.
original English: You want to make me work for you.

original Spanish: Te dedicamos esto. Es suficiente para mostrar nuestra sinceridad
original English: If we dedicate this to you is it enough to show our sincerity?

original Spanish: Siput de mar es mi tesoro fueron robados por ustedes Ahora
original English: The Wanhai conch was originally my treasure but you took it away now

original Spanish: En aquel entonces la Ciudad Wuji temía mi capacidad Me amenazó para amenazarme y fue encarcelado.
original English: Back then your Wuji City was afraid of my ability and used the lives of my crew to blackmail me to voluntarily surrender.

original Spanish: Me amenazó varias veces para trabajar por ustedes.
original English: I am in the ice prison but you tried to threaten me several times to work for you.

original Spanish: Me amenazó varias veces para trabajar por ustedes.
original English: I am in the ice prison but you tried to threaten me several times to work for you.

original Spanish: iremos directamente a la comisaría marina para matarlo
original English: Let's go straight to the Coastguard Commission and kill them.

original Spanish: Me costó mucho llegar a la lista de cien piratas marinas por eso merezco a Haiji.
original English: I had a hard time getting on the list of top 100 pirates just barely worthy of Haiji.

original Spanish: Hoy tengo que para mejorar el ranking
original English: I must take you two to improve my ranking today.

original Spanish: Por fin entiendo por qué insististe en ir al mar con el número de viuda negro.
original English: I finally know why you insist on using the Black Widow.

original Spanish: Por fin entiendo por qué insististe en ir al mar con el número de viuda negro.
original English: I finally know why you insist on using the Black Widow.

original Spanish: Tal vez es el arma afilado para controlar el farol.
original English: Maybe it is a powerful weapon for us to drive through the Waters of Death and defeat the Lantern Ghost King.

original Spanish: La última vez llevé a mis hermanos al calabozo para salvarte.
original English: Last time when I went to save you in the ice prison with our brothers.

original Spanish: Creo que estamos vigilados por el Rey de Fantasma del farol.
original English: I think we are being watched by the Lantern Ghost King.

original Spanish: Hermano por fin te despiertas
original English: You are finally awake my brother.

original Spanish: Come algo bueno para nutrir la salud
original English: Have something good to eat. Make up for your body.

original Spanish: Fuiste capturada por el Rey Fantasma del farol.
original English: You got caught by the Lantern Ghost King.

original Spanish: En ese momento no sé por qué
original English: At that time

original Spanish: Hace veinte años para enfrentar la deficiencia de recursos futuros
original English: Twenty years ago to meet the extreme lack of resources in the future

original Spanish: Luo Dayong y yo como investigadores hemos sido ordenados para investigar que puede evolucionar rápidamente el cuerpo humano para adaptarse a la supervivencia del océano.
original English: Luo Dayong and I were appointed as researchers to develop a reagent that can evolve human body real fast to adapt to living in the sea.

original Spanish: por eso te buscaba por todas partes.
original English: So I kept looking for you.

original Spanish: por eso te buscaba por todas partes.
original English: So I kept looking for you.

original Spanish: lo he buscado por tantos años él es una persona tan despreciable.
original English: I never expected that he was such a despicable person.

original Spanish: Sé que te duele mucho será muy doloroso por un tiempo.
original English: I know that since the emotional link is broken you must be very sad for a while.

original Spanish: Te acompañaremos para siempre
original English: We will be here for you.

original Spanish: Convoca a los otros cuatro reinos para enviar una orden secreta a los piratas marinos.
original English: Assemble the other four kings and send out a secret order to all pirates on the sea.

original Spanish: Esta es la marca del mar hecha especialmente por la comisaría marina.
original English: These markers are specially made by the Coastguard Commission.

original Spanish: Están vagando en el mar no se mueven por las olas.
original English: They will float on the sea and won't move due to winds or waves.

original Spanish: Vivimos por todas partes y luchamos por todas partes.
original English: We drifted about fought against all.

original Spanish: Todo se usa para el motor del vapor para el vapor se encarga de abrir y excavar
original English: He is in charge of the excavating and mining of all the coals and minerals used for steam power.

original Spanish: Debido a la pólvora hecha por ella tenemos de armas y armas.
original English: Thanks to the gunpowder developed by her we have the capabilities to invade and plunder by firearms.

original Spanish: Todos los monedas que usamos son producidos por él.
original English: He makes all the currency we use to trade .

original Spanish: Ven a servir el vino para mi hermano.
original English: Pour wine for our brother. Refill it.

original Spanish: ¿Tu conciencia fue devorado por un perro?
original English: Do you have any conscience?

original Spanish: Si no fuera por los dos mortales de mi casa ¿cómo podría hacer esto?
original English: I did all these things because of my families.

original Spanish: Si la persigues para perseguirla.
original English: It might be hard for you to go after her.

original Spanish: Desde el día que está dispuesta a luchar por mí ella es mi vida.
original English: She has been my life since the day she was willing to sacrifice her life for me.

original Spanish: Si quiere volar voy a sailar para ella.
original English: I will set sail if she wants to set sail.

original Spanish: Incluso si al final se cae en el abrazo de los demás seguiré corriendo y ser su figura para toda la vida
original English: I'll be her side all the time and be her chief mate even if she marries to someone else in the end.

original Spanish: Si ella estuviera aquí no habría estado loca por tantos años.
original English: I wouldn't have been mad for years if she were still here.

original Spanish: Para salvarla para salvarla.
original English: In order to save her I did an experiment on her privately.

original Spanish: Todo esto es para atraerte.
original English: I did all these things just for attracting you here.

original Spanish: Solo para que la búsqueda de nuevo continente de encontrar un nuevo continente.
original English: The purpose is to make the show of looking for the new land more real.

original Spanish: Puedo darte todo mi dinero para que tu hija tenga el mejor tratamiento
original English: I can give all my money to you so that your daughter can receive the best treatment.

original Spanish: Te agradezco mucho por decirme esto.
original English: I really appreciate your telling me about all these things.

original Spanish: su personalidad. su amor por mí.
original English: his conduct and his love for me.

original Spanish: Creo que su amor por mí
original English: I believe his love for me

original Spanish: estoy dispuesto a usar mi sangre para salvar a tu hija.
original English: I'm willing to save your daugther with my own blood.

original Spanish: Luo Shi Gracias por todo lo que has hecho
original English: Luo Li thank you for doing all these things.

original Spanish: Si es posible por favor déjame usar el resto de mi vida la botella para disculparse.
original English: If I could please let me repent of and atone for -Bottle. -Bottle.

original Spanish: Si es posible por favor déjame usar el resto de mi vida la botella para disculparse.
original English: If I could please let me repent of and atone for -Bottle. -Bottle.

original Spanish: Atrás dejaba la pasión y el entusiasmo de la vida y por delante tenía la melancolía del invierno.
original English: Life lay astern with fire and zest and ahead lay a winter's gloom.

original Spanish: Su esposa cosía tranquila iluminada por la luz del sol. Y en la cuna había una rosada y sana niña que reía feliz.
original English: His wife sat and span in the peaceful light but the crib held a rosy healthy mite a baby girl and it crowed.

original Spanish: Los cruceros ingleses bloquearon todos los puertos. En tierra firme había escasez por todas partes.
original English: Cruisers from England blockaded each port by land there was dearth far and wide;

original Spanish: Terje Vigen remó por su esposa e hija ¡cruzó el mar en un bote!
original English: Terje Vigen rowed for his wife and child crossed the sea in an open boat!

original Spanish: Desembarcó en el muelle convertido en piloto por decreto real.
original English: Back at the jetty he came ashore a pilot by King's decree;

original Spanish: Sus mejillas palidecieron y su boca emitió un sonido como una sonrisa que puede por fin liberarse.
original English: His cheeks they went white and his mouth shaped a sound like a smile that at last can break free.

original Spanish: No hay motivo para desesperarse un bote hundido es nuestra salvación y tres sacos de grano de cebada nuestro puerto.
original English: There's no cause for grief a sunken dory supplies our relief three barley grain casks our dock.

original Spanish: Me sacrificaba por mi familia con el sudor de mi frente tú les robaste el pan." "Y aún así te burlabas y reías de mis amargas lágrimas.
original English: I toiled for my own in my forehead's sweat you robbed them of bread and could mock me yet and over my salt tears gloat.

original Spanish: A comienzos del siglo XVI un grupo de españoles consiguen con la astucia conquistar Méjico sometiendo a cien mil guerreros aztecas y a un pueblo que poseía riquezas para comprar el mundo.
original English: At the beginning of the 16th century a band of Spaniards succeeded by guile to conquer Mexico subjugating a hundred thousand Aztec warriors and a people who possessed wealth quite sufficient to buy the world.

original Spanish: Y los españoles aprovecharon el hecho de que su llegada a tierras mejicanas coincidiera con la fecha fijada por la leyenda para el esperado regreso del Blanco Nume.
original English: And the Spaniards took advantage of the fact that their arrival on Mexican soil corresponded with the date fixed by the legend for the long-awaited return of the white God.

original Spanish: Y los españoles aprovecharon el hecho de que su llegada a tierras mejicanas coincidiera con la fecha fijada por la leyenda para el esperado regreso del Blanco Nume.
original English: And the Spaniards took advantage of the fact that their arrival on Mexican soil corresponded with the date fixed by the legend for the long-awaited return of the white God.

original Spanish: El 14 de marzo de 1519 los españoles descendían por la costa de lo que luego fue llamado Méjico.
original English: On March 4th 1519 the Spaniards descended on the coast of the land that was later called 'Mexico'...

original Spanish: - - He venido de muy lejos prima mía para pedir tu mano de esposa.
original English: I have come from afar my cousin to ask for your hand in marriage!

original Spanish: - Con estos dos jefes de tribu id al encuentro de los extranjeros ofrecedles preciosos dones y convencedles para que partan.
original English: With these two heads of tribes visit the foreigners... and by giving them precious gifts persuade them to go!

original Spanish: Exaltado por su furor religioso Taloc venía a escoger su primera víctima...
original English: Exalted by his cruel religious fervor Taloc was to choose the first victim...

original Spanish: Inclinada por un exquisito sentido de la humanidad hacia una religión más evolucionada y sensible Tezca aborrecía el feroz rito de los sacrificios humanos practicado por el sacerdote entre el pueblo.
original English: Inclined by an exquisite sense of humanity to a religion more evolved... and sensible Tezca loathed the fierce ritual human sacrifices... practiced by the priests of her people.

original Spanish: -- ¡Por orden del emperador no se dejará salir a ninguna mujer por las puertas de la ciudad!
original English: By order of the Emperor no woman is to be let out from the gates of the city!

original Spanish: -- ¡Por orden del emperador no se dejará salir a ninguna mujer por las puertas de la ciudad!
original English: By order of the Emperor no woman is to be let out from the gates of the city!

original Spanish: - No somos enemigos pero queremos entrar a toda costa en vuestra ciudad para que los aztecas se postren ante la Cruz.
original English: We do not want to be enemies but at all costs we must come into your city... because the Aztecs must bow down before the Cross".

original Spanish: - Tú no podrás vencer a Moctezuma por la fuerza... ¡Él no teme al poder del Blanco Nume!
original English: You won't defeat Montezuma by force. He fears no power other than the white God!

original Spanish: Vengo aquí para recibir tu homenaje y para guiar hacia la Cruz a tu pueblo que ahora yace en las tinieblas de la idolatría.
original English: ... I come here to receive from you a tribute and to drive your people... now lying in the darkness of idolatry towards the Cross".

original Spanish: - Pero si puedo abriros esa puerta para salvar al capitán ¿abandonaréis la ciudad sin querer conquistarla? - ¿Lo juráis?
original English: But after I have given you the way to save your captain... you will leave the city without attempting to conquer it?

original Spanish: - Después de dos meses de lucha por fin hemos podido entrar en la ciudad y no la abandonaremos.
original English: After long months of struggle we finally entered the city... not just to abandon it!

original Spanish: Del campo no crecerá ni un grano para alimentarte.
original English: Arid will be each land whereon thou shalt live! ...

original Spanish: Y todos los dioses incluso el de los cristianos te olvidarán para la eternidad.
original English: ... The Sun will no more give light to your eyes! ...

original Spanish: Ya que no hay súbditos para gobernar ¡déjame morir aquí junto a mi padre que murió por su pueblo!
original English: No! I will not try to save myself! Since I have no more subjects to govern let me die here at the side of my father who died for his people!

original Spanish: Ya que no hay súbditos para gobernar ¡déjame morir aquí junto a mi padre que murió por su pueblo!
original English: No! I will not try to save myself! Since I have no more subjects to govern let me die here at the side of my father who died for his people!

original Spanish: ¡Habría que matarse los unos a los otros para poseerlo!
original English: If you have to cut each others throats to possess this treasure... then to hell with it!

original Spanish: LA ALEGRE PRISIÓN UNA COMEDIA EN TRES ACTOS por ERNST LUBITSCH y HANNS KRÄLY
original English: THE MERRY JAIL A COMEDY IN THREE ACTS by ERNST LUBITSCH and HANNS KRÄLY

original Spanish: Dirigida por ERNST LUBITSCH
original English: Directed by ERNST LUBITSCH

original Spanish: Ven por favor.
original English: Please come.

original Spanish: Von Reizenstein se prepara para cumplir su pena.
original English: Von Reizenstein gets ready to serve time.

original Spanish: Hágase pasar por mi marido o me pondrá en un compromiso.
